amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to require the Department of the Interior, Department of Agriculture, US Army Corps of Engineers, and Department of Commerce to determine technological needs for permitting programs and report them to Congress annually.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perez amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Perez.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perez amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
